settlements.settlement_name: Papaya Gaming - Bots Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Had a Papaya Gaming account and made a deposit in one or more Papaya games between January 1, 2019 and September 5, 2024

settlements.settlement_name: Mid America Pet Food - Salmonella Contamination Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Bought certain pet foods produced by Mid America Pet Food between October 31, 2022 and February 29, 2024

settlements.settlement_name: 23andMe - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were a 23andMe customer between May 1, 2023 and October 1, 2023 and received notice that your personal information was compromised in a data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Naturalawn of America - Unwanted Texts Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received unwanted texts from Naturalawn of America after requesting not to receive text messages

settlements.settlement_name: Carolina Lease Management (North Carolina) Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Entered a rent-to-own agreement for a storage building with Carolina Lease Management Group and from whom the company tried to collect between April 8, 2017 and March 9, 2018

settlements.settlement_name: Fathom Realty - Unwanted Texts Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received texts from or on behalf of Fathom's former real estate agent, Marcus Edwards, between August 15, 2021 and December 15, 2024 when your number was on the National Do Not Call Registry

settlements.settlement_name: Nations Direct Mortgage - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Private information was compromised in the December 2023 Nations Direct Mortgage data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Oklahoma Spine Hospital - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received a notice stating that your personal information was exposed in a July 2024 Oklahoma Spine Hospital data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Redeemer Health - Data Privacy Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were a patient of Redeemer Health between January 1, 2019 and March 21, 2023 and used Redeemer's website during that time

settlements.settlement_name: Restek Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in the June 2023 Restek Corporation data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Wells Fargo COVID Forbearance Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were provided a mortgage forbearance by Wells Fargo during the COVID-19 pandemic without informed consent

settlements.settlement_name: Behavioral Health Resources - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice of the November 2024 Behavioral Health Resources data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Dakota Eye Institute - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in a Dakota Eye Institute data breach discovered in October 2023

settlements.settlement_name: Instinct Pet Foods - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in a data breach Instinct Pet Foods discovered in October 2024

settlements.settlement_name: Liberty Hospital - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was affected by the December 2023 Liberty Hospital data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Multnomah County - Property Foreclosures Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Held or are the heir and successor to a person or entity who held an ownership interest in property that was foreclosed on and sold in Multnomah County between October 12, 2017 and June 25, 2025

settlements.settlement_name: Planned Parenthood of Montana - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice that their private information may have been compromised in a Planned Parenthood of Montana data breach, which took place in August 2024

settlements.settlement_name: Progressive - Stacked UM/UIM Coverage Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: TBD

settlements.settlement_name: City of Hope National Medical Center - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice of a data breach affecting City of Hope National Medical Center that was discovered in October 2023

settlements.settlement_name: Mile Hi Foods - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Got a notice from Mile Hi Foods, Co. about a September 2024 data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Orthopedics Rhode Island - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were sent a notice stating that your personal information was potentially compromised in a September 2024 Orthopedics Rhode Island data breach

settlements.settlement_name: San Diego Unified School District - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was potentially impacted by an October 2022 data breach affecting San Diego Unified School District

settlements.settlement_name: Therapeutic Health Services - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was compromised in a February 2024 data breach involving Therapeutic Health Services

settlements.settlement_name: RIBridges - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in a data breach involving the Rhode Island RIBridges system

settlements.settlement_name: Toyota Hands-Free Echo Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Owned, bought or leased certain 2014-2019 Toyota vehicles in certain states

settlements.settlement_name: AirportParking.com - Booking Fees (California) Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Made a booking on AirportParkingReservations.com or AirportParking.com between July 1, 2024 and March 10, 2025 as a California resident and paid a mandatory service charge

settlements.settlement_name: Cencora, The Lash Group - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.dollar_amount_per_claimant: Up to $5,000 or pro rata cash payment
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in a data breach disclosed in February 2024 that involved Cencora or The Lash Group

settlements.settlement_name: Robert Morris University - COVID Tuition Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were enrolled at Robert Morris University during the Spring 2020 semester and paid tuition or fees

settlements.settlement_name: Limited Run Games - VPPA Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: TBD

settlements.settlement_name: Anthem - Mental Health Treatment Class Action Settlement
settlements.dollar_amount_per_claimant: Reimbursement of out-of-pocket expenses or $100 nominal payment
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Anthem or Anthem UM Services denied claim for health insurance coverage for residential treatment of a mental health condition or substance use disorder

settlements.settlement_name: Joybird, La-Z-Boy - Deceptive Discounts Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: TBD

settlements.settlement_name: Nelnet - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: TBD

settlements.settlement_name: Alabama Cardiovascular Group - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.dollar_amount_per_claimant: Up to $5,000 for documented losses or pro rata cash payment, plus two years of credit monitoring
settlements.eligibility_requirements: TBD
